title: Gulp tasks configuration for WebDriverCss test project and admin panel
body:
1. Repositories files in angular app should be cleaned before starting it 
2. Start the admin panel via gulp
3. Execute tests

title: fix disabled menu items can be selected in IE11
body:
You can select disabled menu items in IE11 - http://screencast.com/t/Gt5gl7Gq
Steps to reproduce:
1) Open this dojo sample in IE11 - http://dojo.telerik.com/iyUzI/10
2) Click on first item-> sub item 1,2,3
Actual - disabled items are selected. Expected - disabled items should not be selected.

Public item: telerik/kendo-ui-core#2378
creator: spatarinski

title: Validate event doesn't fire on blur
body:
### Bug report
### Reproduction of the problem

http://dojo.telerik.com/@tsvetomir/OVoCA
### Current behavior

The validity of the form inputs is updated on blur. Yet, the _validate_ event only fires when clicking the button.
### Expected behavior

The _validate_ event should fire every time the input validity status is updated on screen.
### Reason for Suggesting the Feature

The current behavior is not intuitive and leads to confusion as apparent from this [forum thread](http://www.telerik.com/forums/attempting-to-get-an-event-on-validation).
### Environment
- **Kendo UI version:** 2016.2.714
- **jQuery version:** any
- **Browser:** all

Public item: telerik/kendo-ui-core#2125
creator: spatarinski

title: Editor does not wrap content correctly on iOS
body: ### Bug report Kendo UI Editor does not wrap words as expected, instead, very long words stick out of the content element: As a work around you may apply a CSS rule `word-break: break-all;`, however, it will break a word in two if it is too long to fit on the same line: ``` var editor = $("#editor").kendoEditor().data("kendoEditor"); editor.body.style.wordBreak = "break-all"; ``` ### Reproduction of the problem Test it on an iOS device, does not reproduce on simulators nor on Android phones. [Dojo](http://dojo.telerik.com/iYaZi) [Fullscreen](http://runner.telerik.io/fullscreen/iYaZi) ### Expected/desired behavior Editor should wrap content/break words ### Environment * **Kendo UI version:** 2016.3.1028 * **Browser:** [ iOS XX Safari ] Public item: telerik/kendo-ui-core#2438
creator: nlazarov

title: Keyboard undo command in Safari does not undo correctly content in Editor
body:
### Bug report
The editor does not track formatting changes in the undo stack on Safari/Chrome on MAC

### Reproduction of the problem

1. Open this live demo on Safari on MAC: http://demos.telerik.com/kendo-ui/editor/index
2. Select any part of the content.
3. Apply a formatting change
4. Insert any text anywhere.
5. Apply other formatting change
6. Press the Command+ Z

The text inserted is removed and the formatted text remains.

### Expected/desired behavior
The Undo functionality should work as on Windows and the formatting should be removed

### Environment

* **Kendo UI version:** 2016.3.1028
* **Browser:** MAC Chrome and Safari

Public item: telerik/kendo-ui-core#2423
creator: nlazarov

title: Data-role attributes are not removed from the tables when obtaining the content
body:
### Bug report

The data-role="resizable" attributes are not removed from the tr and td elements when obtaining the content from the Kendo Editor.

### Reproduction of the problem
Go to [http://demos.telerik.com/kendo-ui/editor/all-tools](http://demos.telerik.com/kendo-ui/editor/all-tools) and insert a table.
You'll see multiple data-role="resizable" attributes inside the tr and td elements

### Current behavior
When viewing the source of the HTML or getting the content data-role="resizable" attributes are available in the table and tr tags.

### Expected/desired behavior
Ultimately, when viewing the source of the HTML or getting the content, we should not be seeing this extra code which is there purely for the behaviour within the editor.

### Environment

* **Kendo UI version:** 2016.3.1028
* **Browser:** all

Public item: telerik/kendo-ui-core#2399
creator: nlazarov

title: Apply font family to the 'Export As' dropdown options
body:
The following font family need to be applied to the 'Export As' dropdown options:
**"Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"**

Currently the Dropdown element is decorated with Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif by kendo.common-material.css
however the dropdown has font family "Arial" only.
creator: mparvanov

title: Editor moves special character to new line when pressing Enter
body:
### Bug report

### Reproduction of the problem
1. Open [http://demos.telerik.com/kendo-ui/editor/index](http://demos.telerik.com/kendo-ui/editor/index)
2. Insert a special character via "ALT" Key (e.g., "ALT+1") and press "Enter".

video: [http://screencast.com/t/VS9btt7C5](http://screencast.com/t/VS9btt7C5)
### Current behavior
The cursor (and the special character) are in a new line. The cursor is placed before the special character.

### Expected/desired behavior
The special character remains on the original line, while the cursor is moved to the next one.

### Environment

* **Kendo UI version:** 2016.3.1028
* **Browser:** [all] 

### Public item
telerik/kendo-ui-core#2426
creator: vveesseelliinnaa

title: Add clear color button in the ColorPicker widget
body:
There should be a clear color button in the ColorPicker widget. This button will reset the value to `null`.

There should be an option to show/hide the clear color button.

Steps:
- [x] UX
- [x] Implementation
- [x] Documentation
creator: nstoychev

title: Cannot remove a chosen/loaded color from the ColorPicker from TableWizard dialog

title: Expose popup's appendTo option in ContextMenu's options
body:
### Enhancement

This option will enable developers to control where to render the DOM element for the context menu.
### Use case

Using the context menu in dynamically loaded content, like popups, dialogs, containers. This will prevent DOM elements to be rendered in the body and create duplicates on reloading the containers. Plus, the same will resolve appears issues with the same scenario.
### Details

Current code: https://github.com/telerik/kendo-ui-core/blob/master/src/kendo.menu.js#L1465-L1472

Suggestion: 

``` JS
...
.kendoPopup({
    anchor: that.target || "body",
    copyAnchorStyles: that.options.copyAnchorStyles,
    collision: that.options.popupCollision || "fit",
    animation: that.options.animation,
    activate: that._triggerProxy,
    deactivate: that._triggerProxy,
    appendTo: that.options.appendTo
}).data("kendoPopup");
```

Ticket: https://admin.telerik.com/?Context=Support&Control=~%2fUserControls%2fSupport%2fThreadReply.ascx&ST=1069162&SM=0

Make sure to document that so to appear in the wrappers. 
### Public item: telerik/kendo-ui-core#2336
creator: Iankodj

title: Implement logged issue tracker in WebDriverCss-AdminPanel

There should be a checkbox indicating whether an issue found in the tests is already checked and logged in github. Next to the confirm change button, there should be an indication if the issue is tested by QA and logged.

title: Create Table Wizard dialog for Editor widget
body:
You can find the design at [file:///R:/UX/KendoUI/Widgets%20UX%20Specs/Editor/Table_Wizard.png](file:///R:/UX/KendoUI/Widgets%20UX%20Specs/Editor/Table_Wizard.png)
- [x] Implement Table view in Table Wizard (needs #5885)
- [x] Implement Cell view in Table Wizard (needs #5887)
- [x] Implement Accessibility view in Table Wizard (needs #5888)
- [x] Wire up Table Wizard dialog with Editor commands (needs #5889)
- [x] Document the Table Wizard dialogs

Issues:
- [x] Apply Tabstrip background in Table wizard dialog #5972 
- [x] Text align icons are not centered in Table wizard dialog #5973
- [x]  Update Kedno font styles with table and cell alignment icons #6014 
- [x]  Add font icons for cell and table alignment in TableWizard #6017 
- [x]  Table Wizard Dialog Improvements #6040
- [x] The value of "Border style" dropdown is not preserved in Table Wizard dialog #6050 
- [x] Change the casing of border styles dropdown values to lower case needs #6076
- [x] Set min values to the numeric textboxes(no negative sizes) needs #6077
- [x] Cannot remove a chosen/loaded color from the ColorPicker - we need design #6262
- [x] Add localization strings - needs #6152
- [x] TableWizard tool title from the InsertTable popup is not localized needs #6139
- [x] Cell margin and Cell Padding (cell tab) are applied as invalid properties instead as styles needs #6140
- [x] Cells with same id can be applied by Cell tab needs #6141
- [x] Max-height of 720px set to`.k-editor-table-wizard-dialog` element breaks the layout with bigger font sizes - the max-height is set because of IE the issue occurs because the CSS styles are loaded with a few milliseconds delay - needs #6154
- [x] IndexSizeError is thrown when opening Table Wizard and previous selection over a table is applied #6095
creator: nlazarov
